summary: In an attempt to woo the rich women, two prankster-loving men becomes prime suspects of a murder of a woman.
cast: Sharman Joshi|Sahil Khan|Riya Sen|Shilpi Sharma|Tara Deshpande|Kamal Adib|Dolly Bindra|Bobby Darling|Darshan Jariwala|Kamaladeep|Shakti Kapoor|Sikandar Kharbanda|Neelu Kohli|Lilliput|Atul Parchure|Vishwajeet Pradhan|Varsha Usgaonkar|Puneet Vashisht|Vivek Vaswani
title: Style
